text: Xinfeng tian jing de ren a! Zai zhong tianshi (de tong dao) zhongduan zhihou, wo de shizhe que yi lailin nimen, wei nimen chanming jiaoyi, yimian nimen jianglai shuo:“Meiyou renhe baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe lailin women.” Yige baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe, que yi lailin nimenle. An la duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
